title: What year do you think the world will become fully eco-friendly? - Quora

response.answer_text: Whatever year human life ceases to exist. Nothing is completely eco-friendly, and what qualifies is arguable. Electric cars may seem eco-friendly, but they require lots of toxic materials for their batteries and an accident leaks hazardous waste. Plus the electricity to charge them is still produced by coal burning plants. Nuclear power was once hailed as the clean energy solution of the future.
